p: In addition, we also computed other models that have been applied in dengue prediction. The BPNN model has shown excellent performance in multivariate time series prediction. For the BPNN model, an optimal parameter (include the number of neurons in the hidden layer and learning rate) was selected to avoid overfitting and improve the predictive performance [ 32]. For the SVR model, we considered using an Îµ-SVR approach, which uses a linear kernel function to track dengue dynamics [ 46]. For the GAM model [ 47] and the GBM model [ 48], the parameters of training used the default values in the python package.
